home.welcome: Chào mừng bạn đến với ứng dụng của chúng tôi!

notFound.title: Không tìm thấy trang
notFound.description: Đường dẫn bạn truy cập có thể đã bị xóa hoặc chưa tồn tại.
notFound.hint: Kiểm tra lại URL hoặc thử tìm kiếm nội dung khác.

footer.brandDescription: Achi Vegan House phuc vu gan 100 mon chay tu rau cu, trai cay va cac loai hat huu co.
footer.address: 50 Thuy Khue, Thuy Khue, Tay Ho, Ha Noi, Viet Nam
services: Bua an chay cho gia dinh tai nha
Dich vu tiec chay cho gia dinh va to chuc
footer.legal: (c) {year} Achi Vegan House. Moi quyen duoc bao luu.

header.menuDescription: Mo menu dieu huong di dong cho Achi Vegan House.

items.review: Huong vi thanh nhat, can bang. Ban be khong an chay van quay lai.
Dich vu tiec chay rat chu dao va dung gio. Ai cung hoi thuc don.
Rau cu tuoi, gia vi nhe, phan an hau ha. Hop bua toi trong tuan.
Mon nao cung cam giac lam thu cong. Chat luong huu co rat ro.
Cho ngoi ngoai troi thoang va yen. Gia ca hop ly.
Dat mon gia dinh thuong xuyen, chat luong on dinh.

privacy.metaTitle: Chinh sach bao mat | Achi Vegan House
privacy.metaDescription: Tim hieu cach Achi Vegan House thu thap, su dung va bao ve du lieu khi ban truy cap website hoac lien he.
privacy.title: Chinh sach bao mat
privacy.tagline: Chung toi bao ve thong tin cua ban khi ban truy cap website hoac lien he ve mon chay, tiec chay hoac su kien.
privacy.sectionEyebrow: Bao mat tai Achi Vegan House

quickPoints.title: Muc dich ro rang
quickPoints.description: Chi thu thap nhung gi can thiet de phan hoi, gui bao gia, xu ly tiec chay/don hang va cai thien trai nghiem.

quickPoints.title: Khong ban du lieu
quickPoints.description: Chung toi khong ban du lieu ca nhan. Neu can chia se chi trong pham vi nha cung cap uy tin ho tro van hanh.

quickPoints.title: Ban kiem soat
quickPoints.description: Ban co the yeu cau truy cap, chinh sua, xoa du lieu hoac rut lai dong y bat cu luc nao.

quickPoints.title: Bao mat uu tien
quickPoints.description: Gioi han truy cap noi bo va ap dung bien phap ky thuat, to chuc de giam rui ro.

sections.title: 1. Pham vi ap dung
sections.summary: Chinh sach nay ap dung cho thong tin chung toi thu thap khi ban tuong tac voi Achi Vegan House.
items: Ap dung khi ban truy cap website, gui form lien he, goi dien, email, nhan tin mang xa hoi, hoac trao doi truc tiep tai quan.
Khi su dung website hoac cung cap thong tin, ban dong y voi chinh sach nay.

sections.title: 2. Thong tin chung toi thu thap
items: Thong tin ban cung cap: ho ten, email, so dien thoai, noi dung yeu cau, thong tin don hang/dich vu, phan hoi, danh gia.
Thong tin ky thuat tu dong: dia chi IP, trinh duyet, thiet bi, he dieu hanh, trang vao/ra, thoi gian xem trang, thao tac co ban.
Cookie va cong nghe tuong tu de ghi nho tuy chon va do hieu qua website.

sections.title: 3. Cach chung toi su dung thong tin
items: Phan hoi yeu cau, gui bao gia, xac nhan va theo doi don hang hoac tiec chay.
Cai thien toc do, noi dung va trai nghiem tren website.
Gui thong tin quan trong (vi du: thay doi gio mo cua, cap nhat menu, theo doi don hang).
Phat hien va ngan chan gian lan hoac lam dung he thong.

sections.title: 4. Cookie va theo doi
items: Chung toi su dung cookie de ghi nho tuy chon, do tuong tac va toi uu hieu suat website.
Ban co the tat cookie trong trinh duyet. Mot so tinh nang co the bi han che.

sections.title: 5. Chia se thong tin
items: Chung toi khong ban du lieu ca nhan cho ben thu ba.
Co the chia se voi nha cung cap dich vu (luu tru, phan tich, thanh toan, cong cu marketing) de van hanh va cai thien website.
Co the chia se voi doi tac lien quan don hang/dich vu khi can thiet, kem cam ket bao mat.
Tuan thu yeu cau hop phap cua co quan chuc nang khi can.

sections.title: 6. Bao mat du lieu
items: Ap dung bien phap ky thuat va to chuc de ngan truy cap trai phep, sua doi hoac tiet lo.
Gioi han quyen truy cap noi bo theo vai tro va nhu cau cong viec.
Khong co phuong thuc truyen tai hoac luu tru nao an toan tuyet doi.

sections.title: 7. Luu tru du lieu
items: Chi luu tru trong thoi gian can thiet de dap ung muc dich thu thap.
Xoa hoac an danh du lieu khi ban yeu cau, tru khi phap luat yeu cau luu tru lau hon.

sections.title: 8. Quyen cua ban
items: Yeu cau truy cap, chinh sua hoac xoa du lieu ca nhan.
Rut lai dong y hoac phan doi mot so hoat dong xu ly.
Gui yeu cau qua thong tin lien he ben duoi; chung toi phan hoi trong thoi gian hop ly.

sections.title: 9. Lien ket ben thu ba
items: Website co the chua lien ket toi dich vu/website cua ben thu ba.
Chung toi khong chiu trach nhiem ve noi dung hay chinh sach bao mat cua ho.

sections.title: 10. Quyen rieng tu tre em
items: Website khong huong toi tre em duoi 13 tuoi va khong chu y thu thap du lieu tu nhom nay.
Neu ban tin chung toi co du lieu ve tre em, vui long lien he de chung toi xoa bo.

sections.title: 11. Cap nhat chinh sach
items: Chung toi co the cap nhat chinh sach va se dang phien ban moi nhat tren trang nay.
Vui long xem lai dinh ky. Cap nhat gan nhat: 13/01/2026.

contact.title: Lien he Achi Vegan House
contact.description: Neu ban co cau hoi hoac muon thuc thi quyen rieng tu, vui long lien he qua:
contact.address: 50 Thuy Khue, Thuy Khue, Tay Ho, Ha Noi, Viet Nam

privacy.rightsCopy: Chung toi phan hoi trong thoi gian hop ly (thuong trong 1-2 ngay lam viec) va co the xac minh danh tinh.
rightsBullets: Yeu cau ban sao du lieu ca nhan ban da cung cap.
Yeu cau chinh sua thong tin khong chinh xac hoac thieu.
Yeu cau xoa du lieu, tru khi phap luat yeu cau luu tru.
Rut lai dong y nhan email/tin nhan khong thiet yeu.

menu.metaDescription: Kham pha thuc don Achi Vegan House voi mon chay thu cong va nguyen lieu huu co.
menu.title: Thuc don
menu.tagline: Thuc don chay duoc chau chuot tu rau cu huu co, theo mua va huong vi tinh te.
menu.sectionSubtitle: Keo xuong de xem tung trang
